evidence.claim: Dosentrx uses FHIR and HL7 protocols for health data integration and interoperability.
The company has partnered with EHR systems to enable seamless patient data flow.
Dosentrx implements HIPAA-compliant environments for handling sensitive health information.
They utilize cloud services for secure data storage and patient data management.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse activities found.
